  • NVd3 pie charts

    Serves SQL dummy data as JSON to be rendered as Pie Charts. It can also be filtered by date and year using custom built filter

    Serves SQL dummy data as JSON to be rendered as Line Charts. It can also be filtered by date and year using custom built filter
